doc:div.p:
These tutorials cover the basics of creating messaging applications using RabbitMQ.
You need to have the RabbitMQ server installed to go through the tutorials ‒ please see the installation guide.
The tutorials here are in Python or Java but there are very good tutorials using other programming languages available elsewhere.
Once you have been through the tutorials (or if you want to skip ahead), you may wish to browse our AMQP Reference Guide.
